title: Sudan coup: Why Omar al-Bashir was overthrown
snippet: Lt Gen Abdel Fattah Abdelrahman Burhan was then named as head of the transitional military council, to become Sudan's third leader in as many days. According to the foreign ministry, Gen Burhan is "committed to having a complete civilian government".
